title: Repented from playing music, taught my friend to play guitar, he uses it, am I sinful Assim al hakee
transcript: says that his friend plays the guitar and he's the cause of it and the guitar is his is he sinful of course you are it's your guitar take it back once you take it back back break it into pieces you're sinful for every tune he plays and every time he plays because you taught him and the guitar is yours if you repent it from teaching him but that your guitar is still with him you are still sinful for that misbah
